name: Truck Stars AR
description:
Gear up for truck bashin’ multiplayer action in Augmented Reality! Compete in adrenaline pumping four player matches as trucks race to grab the crown and become King. Nab power-ups like Turbo, Super-Size and Bomb-A-Lot and use them to smash opponents.

Truck Stars is a new Augmented Reality game built for ARKit! ARKit blends digital objects and information with the environment around you, taking apps far beyond the screen and freeing them to interact with the real world in entirely new ways.

Choose and customize multiple trucks in your quest to be the brightest Truck Star. Compete in three gorgeous seasonal arenas each with unique weather effects, driving characteristics and special interactive elements.

Truck Stars is compatible with iOS 11, iPhone 6s or higher and newer iPad / iPad Pros.

Please contact support@truckstarsgame.com, or visit http://truckstarsgame.com/support/ if you are experiencing any issues.
